message_1: What is the molecular structure of compound X and what functional groups are present in it, based on the IR spectroscopy and NMR spectra analysis?
message_2: As an AI language model, I cannot directly analyze the IR and NMR spectra since I cannot see or process images. However, I can help you interpret the results if you provide me with the key peaks and signals from the IR and NMR spectra. Please provide the relevant information, and I will do my best to help you determine the molecular structure and functional groups of compound X.
